document.full_text: the texas securities commissioner has issued an emergency cease and desist order against a dallas-area energy company, alleging it is targeting laid-off teachers for the fraudulent sale of oil and gas interests.
document.title: energy company targeting teachers in scam, texas officials say
lines_and_colors: the texas securities commissioner has issued an emergency cease and desist order against a dallas-area energy company, alleging it is targeting laid-off teachers for the fraudulent sale of oil and gas interests.
